SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX

Available versions


  • ver. 5.0
  • ver. 5.4


SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX

Overview

SNMPV2

Works on Office Connect Switches
1910
1920
1950

Low Level Discovery for:

  • CPU
  • Fan Status
  • Interfaces (Ports) - includes Rx/Tx/Errors/Status
  • Mac Address
  • Memory Stats
  • PSU
  • Tempature Sensors
  • Entity - includes Serial Number, Model Name, Firmware, Hardware revision, OS

Author

Union College

Macros used

There are no macros links in this template.

Template links

There are no template links in this template.

Discovery rules

|Name|Description|Type|Key and additional info| |—-|———–|—-|—-| |Entity Discovery|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|entity.discovery<p>Update: 3600</p>| |Interfaces|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|interfaces.discovery<p>Update: 3600</p>| |PSU Discovery|<p>Discovering all entities of PhysicalClass - 6: powerSupply(6)</p>|SNMP agent|psu.discovery<p>Update: 3600</p>| |Fan Discovery|<p>Discovering all entities of PhysicalClass - 7: fan(7)</p>|SNMP agent|fan.discovery<p>Update: 3600</p>| |Mac Address|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|macaddress.discovery<p>Update: 3600</p>| |Temperature Discovery|<p>Discovering modules temperature (same filter as in Module Discovery) plus and temperature sensors</p>|SNMP agent|temp.discovery<p>Update: 3600</p>| |Memory Useage|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|memoryusage.discovery<p>Update: 3600</p>| |CPU|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|cpu.discovery<p>Update: 3600</p>|

Items collected

|Name|Description|Type|Key and additional info| |—-|———–|—-|—-| |Uptime|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|Uptime<p>Update: 60</p>| |Firmware version|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|system.hw.firmware[entPhysicalFirmwareRev.{#SNMPINDEX}]<p>Update: 3600</p><p>LLD</p>| |Hardware model name|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|system.hw.model[entPhysicalDescr.{#SNMPINDEX}]<p>Update: 3600</p><p>LLD</p>| |Hardware serial number|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|system.hw.serialnumber[entPhysicalSerialNum.{#SNMPINDEX}]<p>Update: 3600</p><p>LLD</p>| |Hardware version(revision)|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|system.hw.version[entPhysicalHardwareRev.{#SNMPINDEX}]<p>Update: 3600</p><p>LLD</p>| |Operating system|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|system.sw.os[entPhysicalSoftwareRev.{#SNMPINDEX}]<p>Update: 3600</p><p>LLD</p>| |In Errors {#SNMPINDEX}|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|ifInErrors[{#SNMPINDEX}]<p>Update: 30</p><p>LLD</p>| |Incoming traffic on interface {#SNMPINDEX}|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|ifInOctets[{#SNMPVALUE}]<p>Update: 10</p><p>LLD</p>| |Status Port {#SNMPINDEX}|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|ifOperStatus[{#SNMPINDEX}]<p>Update: 60</p><p>LLD</p>| |Out Errors {#SNMPINDEX}|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|ifOutErrors[{#SNMPINDEX}]<p>Update: 30</p><p>LLD</p>| |Outgoing traffic on interface {#SNMPINDEX}|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|ifOutOctets[{#SNMPVALUE}]<p>Update: 10</p><p>LLD</p>| |{#ENT_NAME}: Power supply status|<p>MIB: HH3C-ENTITY-EXT-MIB Indicate the error state of this entity object. psuError(51) means that the Power Supply Unit is in the state of fault. rpsError(61) means the Redundant Power Supply is in the state of fault.</p>|SNMP agent|sensor.psu.status[hh3cEntityExtErrorStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}]<p>Update: 60</p><p>LLD</p>| |{#ENT_NAME}: Fan status|<p>MIB: HH3C-ENTITY-EXT-MIB Indicate the error state of this entity object. fanError(41) means that the fan stops working.</p>|SNMP agent|sensor.fan.status[hh3cEntityExtErrorStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}]<p>Update: 60</p><p>LLD</p>| |Base MAC Address|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|macaddress[{#SNMPINDEX}]<p>Update: 86400</p><p>LLD</p>| |{#MODULE_NAME}: Temperature °C|<p>MIB: HH3C-ENTITY-EXT-MIB The temperature for the {#MODULE_NAME}.</p>|SNMP agent|sensor.temp.value[hh3cEntityExtTemperature.{#SNMPINDEX}]<p>Update: 60</p><p>LLD</p>| |{#MODULE_NAME}: Temperature °F|<p>MIB: HH3C-ENTITY-EXT-MIB The temperature for the {#MODULE_NAME}.</p>|Calculated|sensor.tempf.value[hh3cEntityExtTemperature.{#SNMPINDEX}]<p>Update: 60</p><p>LLD</p>| |Memory Total|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|memory.total[{#SNMPINDEX}]<p>Update: 86400</p><p>LLD</p>| |Memory Useage|<p>-</p>|Calculated|memoryusage.calc[{#SNMPINDEX}]<p>Update: 60</p><p>LLD</p>| |Memory Usage %|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|memoryusage.perc[{#SNMPINDEX}]<p>Update: 60</p><p>LLD</p>| |CPU Percent Utilization|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|cpu[{#SNMPINDEX}]<p>Update: 30</p><p>LLD</p>|

Triggers

Name Description Expression Priority
CPU too high <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX:cpu[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>85</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#ENT_NAME}: Fan is in critical state <p>41 = Fan Error 91 = Hardware Faulty</p> <p>Expression: {SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX:sensor.fan.status[hh3cEntityExtErrorStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,41)}=1 or {SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX:sensor.fan.status[hh3cEntityExtErrorStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,91)}=1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
CRC Errors RX on {#SNMPINDEX} <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX:ifInErrors[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>100</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> warning
CRC Errors TX on {#SNMPINDEX} <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX:ifOutErrors[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>100</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> warning
Low free memory on {HOST.NAME} <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX:memoryusage.perc[{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}>80</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> average
{#ENT_NAME}: Power supply is in critical state <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX:sensor.psu.status[hh3cEntityExtErrorStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,51,eq)}=1 or {SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX:sensor.psu.status[hh3cEntityExtErrorStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,61,eq)}=1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> disaster
{#SNMPVALUE}: Temp to high <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX:sensor.temp.value[hh3cEntityExtTemperature.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>50</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
CRC Errors RX on {#SNMPINDEX} (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX:ifInErrors[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>100</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> warning
CRC Errors TX on {#SNMPINDEX} (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX:ifOutErrors[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>100</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> warning
{#ENT_NAME}: Power supply is in critical state (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX:sensor.psu.status[hh3cEntityExtErrorStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,51,eq)}=1 or {SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX:sensor.psu.status[hh3cEntityExtErrorStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,61,eq)}=1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> disaster
{#ENT_NAME}: Fan is in critical state (LLD) <p>41 = Fan Error 91 = Hardware Faulty</p> <p>Expression: {SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX:sensor.fan.status[hh3cEntityExtErrorStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,41)}=1 or {SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX:sensor.fan.status[hh3cEntityExtErrorStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].count(#1,91)}=1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE}: Temp to high (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX:sensor.temp.value[hh3cEntityExtTemperature.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>50</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
Low free memory on {HOST.NAME} (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX:memoryusage.perc[{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}>80</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> average
CPU too high (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX:cpu[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>85</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high

Triggers

Name Description Expression Priority
CPU too high <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX/cpu[{#SNMPINDEX}])>85</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#ENT_NAME}: Fan is in critical state <p>41 = Fan Error 91 = Hardware Faulty</p> <p>Expression: count(/SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX/sensor.fan.status[hh3cEntityExtErrorStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}],#1,,”41”)=1 or count(/SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX/sensor.fan.status[hh3cEntityExtErrorStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}],#1,,”91”)=1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
CRC Errors RX on {#SNMPINDEX} <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX/ifInErrors[{#SNMPINDEX}])>100</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> warning
CRC Errors TX on {#SNMPINDEX} <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX/ifOutErrors[{#SNMPINDEX}])>100</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> warning
Low free memory on {HOST.NAME} <p>-</p> <p>Expression: avg(/SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX/memoryusage.perc[{#SNMPINDEX}],15m)>80</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> average
{#ENT_NAME}: Power supply is in critical state <p>-</p> <p>Expression: count(/SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX/sensor.psu.status[hh3cEntityExtErrorStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}],#1,”eq”,”51”)=1 or count(/SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX/sensor.psu.status[hh3cEntityExtErrorStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}],#1,”eq”,”61”)=1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> disaster
{#SNMPVALUE}: Temp to high <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX/sensor.temp.value[hh3cEntityExtTemperature.{#SNMPINDEX}])>50</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
CRC Errors RX on {#SNMPINDEX} (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX/ifInErrors[{#SNMPINDEX}])>100</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> warning
CRC Errors TX on {#SNMPINDEX} (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX/ifOutErrors[{#SNMPINDEX}])>100</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> warning
Low free memory on {HOST.NAME} (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: avg(/SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX/memoryusage.perc[{#SNMPINDEX}],15m)>80</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> average
{#SNMPVALUE}: Temp to high (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX/sensor.temp.value[hh3cEntityExtTemperature.{#SNMPINDEX}])>50</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
CPU too high (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX/cpu[{#SNMPINDEX}])>85</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#ENT_NAME}: Fan is in critical state (LLD) <p>41 = Fan Error 91 = Hardware Faulty</p> <p>Expression: count(/SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX/sensor.fan.status[hh3cEntityExtErrorStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}],#1,,”41”)=1 or count(/SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX/sensor.fan.status[hh3cEntityExtErrorStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}],#1,,”91”)=1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#ENT_NAME}: Power supply is in critical state (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: count(/SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX/sensor.psu.status[hh3cEntityExtErrorStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}],#1,”eq”,”51”)=1 or count(/SNMP OfficeConnect 19XX/sensor.psu.status[hh3cEntityExtErrorStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}],#1,”eq”,”61”)=1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> disaster
